snippet: An exhibition from the American Folk Art Museum, displayed at the South Street Seaport Museum, takes in the museum’s subject matter with a special nod to the historical context of its host.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews exhibit Compass: Folk Art in Four Directions, featuring offerings from the American Folk Art Museum, at the South Street Seaport Museum.
lead_paragraph: An exhibition from the American Folk Art Museum, displayed at the South Street Seaport Museum, takes in the museum’s subject matter with a special nod to the historical context of its host.

headline.seo: ‘Compass: Folk Art in Four Directions,’ at South Street Seaport
headline.main: Everyday Treasures Gaze Out to Sea
headline.print_headline: Everyday Treasures Gaze Out to Sea
